headline: Lazard U.S. Equity Focus Portfolio Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: In the first quarter, the Lazard US Equity Focus Portfolio declined 3.6%, outperforming its benchmark, the S&P 500 Index, which lost 4.3%. Read more here.

headline: Blackstone Begins Sale of Clarion Events While the Market Recovers
summary: Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) has started the selling process of UK-based Clarion Events to gauge private equity interest after market disruption brought on by former US President Donald Trump’s tariff policies, according to four sources with knowledge of the situation. After purchasing Clarion for £600 million in 2017, the private equity behemoth helped the company withstand […]
